capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: The role requires advanced communication skills to develop and implement communication strategies, ensuring clear and cohesive messaging across diverse stakeholders.

capabilities.name: Influence and Negotiate
capabilities.description: Given the role's focus on managing multiple stakeholders and potentially conflicting priorities, advanced skills in influencing and negotiating are essential.

capabilities.name: Manage Reform and Change
capabilities.description: Responsible for leading the communication efforts in the transition to renewable energy, the role requires an advanced ability to support, promote, and champion significant changes.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: The role involves strategic planning and prioritization of communication campaigns to effectively promote EnergyCo's initiatives.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: The manager must demonstrate accountability by adhering to policies and legislation while proactively addressing risks in communication strategies.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Collaboration with communities, investors, and industry stakeholders is crucial for the planning and coordination of infrastructure projects.

capabilities.name: Value Diversity
capabilities.description: The role requires respecting and valuing diverse backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives, especially in engaging with Aboriginal communities and diverse stakeholders.

skills.name: Strategic Communication Planning
skills.description: Developing, planning, and implementing communication strategies to support the transition to renewable energy.

skills.name: Stakeholder Management
skills.description: Managing relationships with diverse stakeholders, including communities, investors, and industry partners.

skills.name: Leadership in Communications
skills.description: Leading a communications unit to balance strategic and operational functions effectively.

generalRole.title: Strategic Communications and Campaigns Manager
generalRole.description: This role involves leading strategic communication and campaign efforts to promote renewable energy initiatives, requiring advanced communication, negotiation, and change management skills.
